items.sentence: I\'m looking forward to spending some time in Boston.
I\'ve given Tom permission to do what he wants to do.
If you have time, why don\'t you drop by his gallery?
If you would like some help, why don\'t you call Tom?
There\'s no reason Tom would say something like that.
There\'s something that Tom would like to say to you.
It\'s already eleven o\'clock. I must be leaving now.
A selfish man thinks of nothing but his own feelings.
I ran into an old friend of mine outside the station.
Do you really think you can do that without our help?
